name: Hero P8
description:
This game was made following lazy devs tutorial, an amazing teacher, I'm trying to upload all the things I make here to have a small portfolio, this game has 45 levels, some of them are very hard others are meant to be funny, good luck and let me know if you beat it!, if you just want to test levels individually, download pico-8 and start the cartridge (hero.p8.png), there you can change which level is level 1. Good luck, and thanks for downloading my little project!

If you want to program something like this, make sure to follow lazy dev's tutorial at this link: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLea8cjCua_P0qjjiG8G5FBgqwpqMU7rBk
